marklogic.body:
I am afraid that once again the GOP establishment, in the tank from the beginning for Romney has dealt this nation a bad deck of cards. Romney, is not presidential - Romney WANTS the presidency but can he take the reins of a country now is dire circumstances from every direction due to the liberal Usurper in the WH? Stop and think - who else has the real knowledge of getting a government back on track? Gingrich does. Who else can knock Obama Off the stage in a debate - please don't say Ronney or even Santorum. Gingrich is the only one who has spelled out exactly what and when he would do it - he has a real plan.
Our Constitution says "WE THE PEOPLE" - Congress works for us (supposedly but they have overstepped and in some cases ignored us) - the GOP and the Democrat party are trying to tell us who to vote for...If I have too, I will hold my nose and not Vomit and go to the polls and cast a vote for Romney - as I did McCain (I actually voted for Sarah). As a note: If Sarah Palin were president you would see a huge exit of Congress - remember members of both parties in Alaska are now wearing Orange jumpsuits - maybe that's why the Dems fear her so much....think?
